Package edu.umn.nlpie.mtap.processing

Class ProcessorBase

java.lang.Object
edu.umn.nlpie.mtap.processing.ProcessorBase
Direct Known Subclasses:
EventProcessor
public abstract class ProcessorBase
extends java.lang.Object
Contains functionality related to the handling of processor contexts.

    • enterContext

    • getCurrentContext

    • startedStopwatch

      @NotNull public static @NotNull Stopwatch startedStopwatch​(java.lang.String key)
      Starts a stopwatch keyed by key that will attach its duration to the output of the processor.

      Must be called inside a EventProcessor.process(Event, JsonObject, JsonObjectBuilder) or EventProcessor.process(Event, JsonObject, JsonObjectBuilder) method.

      Parameters:
      key - The key to store the time under.
      Returns:
      A timer object that will automatically store the time elapsed in the processing context.

    • unstartedStopwatch

      @NotNull public static @NotNull Stopwatch unstartedStopwatch​(java.lang.String key)
      Creates a stopwatch keyed by key that will attach its duration to the output of the processor.
      Parameters:
      key - The key to store the time under.
      Returns:
      A timer object that will automatically store the time elapsed in the processing context.

    • metadataMap

      @NotNull public static @NotNull java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> metadataMap​(java.lang.Class<?> processorClass)
